text: The Prime Minister of the Republic of Fiji is the head of government of Fiji. The Prime Minister is appointed by the President. In 2022, Sitiveni Rabuka became the current Prime Minister. ==List of prime ministers of Fiji (1970–present)== |- style="text-align:center;" ! colspan=9| Prime ministers of the Dominion of Fiji |- style="text-align:center;" | colspan=9| Vacant (14 May 1987 – 5 December 1987) |- style="text-align:center;" ! colspan=9| Prime ministers of the Republic of Fiji |- style="text-align:center;" | colspan=9| Vacant (27 May 2000 – 4 July 2000) ==Notes== ==References==
title: Prime Minister of Fiji
